MemoryInfobox.description: 'Once the clues were collected from the statues, Kassandra headed back to Phidias so that he could decode them.'
MemoryInfobox.appearance: 'Assassin's Creed: Odyssey  The Lost Tales of Greece'

General_Description: '''Pieces of the Puzzle''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s [[Genetic memory|genetic memories]], relived by [[Layla Hassan]] in 2018 through the [[Animus|Portable Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: Having discovered all the three symbols, Kassandra returned to [[Phidias]] in [[Elis]].
Section_Dialogue:
*'''Kassandra:''' ''That's the last one. Time to head back to [[Olympia]] and Phidias to find out what all this means.''
Kassandra returned to Elis, making her way to [[Phidias' Workshop, Olympia|Phidias' Workshop]].
*'''Kassandra:''' ''This won't be an easy task, but whatever the messages reveal must be important...''
She entered the workshop and inside, she saw a number of people lamenting over a corpse, revealed to Phidias.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Phidias! I should've never doubted that you were in danger.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra returned from her journey to find Phidias murdered.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]] – [[The Lost Tales of Greece]]''
